alert.note: Alert for Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 08 at 2:22AM MST until January 10 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Southwest Phillips County. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. Light snow is also expected which could lead to areas of blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
